title: Part 8 - METROPOLITAN TRANSPORTATION BUSINESS TAX SURCHARGE
content:
Part 8 - METROPOLITAN TRANSPORTATION BUSINESS TAX SURCHARGE
State Regulations

Subpart 8-1 - GENERAL (§ 8-1.1 to 8-1.3)

Subpart 8-2 - METROPOLITAN COMMUTER TRANSPORTATION DISTRICT (MCTD) APPORTIONMENT PERCENTAGE (§ 8-2.1 to 8-2.8)

Subpart 8-3 - PROPERTY FACTOR OF MCTD APPORTIONMENT PERCENTAGE (§ 8-3.1 to 8-3.5)

Subpart 8-4 - RECEIPTS FACTOR OF MCTD APPORTIONMENT PERCENTAGE (§ 8-4.1)

Subpart 8-5 - PAYROLL FACTOR OF MCTD APPORTIONMENT PERCENTAGE (§ 8-5.1 to 8-5.2)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
